column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////I come here almost everytime I visit Chicago. The deep dish pizza is delicious and ultra filling. I can hardly eat 2 slices because they are so fat and loaded in the best way possible. The wait time was super long every time I went there
column2: but I always leave highly satisfied. Staff was great
column3: and you can order before sitting so that helps save time too. First timers should definitely try it
column4: but after the 5th time for me its starting to lose its MUST GO status a little.
